attributes.action: Legalize Cannabis during  holidays. I.e Christmas day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The amount of domestic problems during holidays like Christmas rise significantly.

This doesn't just cause higher crime rates and a hard day for police officers but it also ruins the occasions for many families.

For 2010 we should make Cannabis legal on some of these days alone.

If the domestic crime levels reduce on those days then we should make it the default law.

Christmas day, New years eve and Saint Georges day would be the best days.
